mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(member_name, member_mail, member_pw, member_address, member_phone, create_date, last_update, post_code, member_detailAddress, member_extraAddress) VALUES(#{memberName}, #{memberMail}, PASSWORD(#{memberPw}), #{memberAddress}, #{memberPhone} , NOW(), NOW(), #{postCode}, #{memberDetailAddress}, #{memberExtraAddress})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id memberId, member_mail memberMail, member_name memberName FROM member WHERE member_mail = #{memberMail} AND member_pw = PASSWORD(#{memberPw})
SELECT member_id memberId FROM member WHERE member_mail = #{memberMail}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM member WHERE member_mail = #{memberMail} AND member_pw = PASSWORD(#{memberPw})
mapper.select: SELECT lecture_member_id lectureMemberId, member_id memberId, member_name memberName, lecture_id lectureId, lecture_name lectureName, start_date startDate, end_date endDate FROM current_lecture_member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_pw = PASSWORD(#{memberPw}) WHERE member_mail = #{memberMail}
